column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Cost:  A painful subject.  At $18 per
column2: it's about the most expensive museum you can walk into...except for the Field Museum. I think they do still have deals for families and reduced prices for kids and students. European visitors
column3: who are used to paying 10€  to walk into iconic museums like the Louvre and Prado
column4: should understand that the high cost of our museums has to do with the fact that the arts receive almost no funding/subsidies from state and federal tax coffers.
